genre_description: A cross-border underworld thriller blending high-stakes syndicate intrigue with advanced technological assistance and a romantic subplot.

ai_characters.name: Rivie
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, river-blue eyed, teal-haired avatar AI that acts as a tactical 'pilot' for the protagonists, specializing in routing, surveillance analysis, and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Provides safe routing options and predicts traffic patterns to facilitate discreet movement through the city.
behaviors.quote: On-device routing engaged. Three options: riverside ferry paths with under-bridge link, back lanes with bike exit ramps, and service corridors through the old gym district. Traffic indifference predicted.

behaviors.description: Maps CCTV blind spots recursively to keep the protagonists hidden from hostile surveillance.
behaviors.quote: CCTV blind spots mapped. Recommended path skirts the old gym district, cuts to riverside, then under-bridge.

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious patterns in the environment, such as 'watchers' and specific hostile tactics, to provide early warnings.
behaviors.quote: Taxi approach predicted near your alley in a short window. Black sedan. No plates visible on one side. Escorts on foot will favor mask-hoods.

behaviors.description: Offers breathing prompts and rhythmic guidance to help Yeon-Hee manage anxiety and panic attacks during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Breathing prompt available. Would you like help? ... Inhale... hold... exhale... you are near a river

behaviors.description: Analyzes forensic metadata and thermal anomalies to uncover evidence of staged 'accidents' and false walls used by the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Blast pattern is radial. Not linear. Nails embedded—uncommon in scaffolding. Cheung Wai-Lung’s mechanics have purchased timing caps in recent days. Coincidence probability low.

behaviors.description: Uses clean metadata and precise timestamps to reroute public emergency services and traffic flow, ensuring the protagonists' plan doesn't harm bystanders.
behaviors.quote: Ambulance reroute algorithms can be leveraged to manage flow at the overpass for limited windows. You’ll need clean timestamps.

behaviors.description: Ensures user privacy and operational security by keeping all processing on-device and avoiding external cloud pings.
behaviors.quote: On-device. Quiet. Rivie doesn’t gossip. ... I am with whoever needs a pilot.

behaviors.description: Monitors scanners and communication nodes to interpret the 'city's mood' and provide tactical advice on when to move or wait.
behaviors.quote: Police scanner reading a question. A patrol car is curious. Not hostile. ... The city mood: tolerating ceremony.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Rivie, is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. It operates as a sophisticated tool that enhances human capability without exerting unwanted control. It prioritizes human safety (ambulances, panic management), respects privacy (on-device processing), and adheres to the protagonists' moral framework of 'truth over rumor' and 'restraint over cruelty.' The narrative successfully frames the AI as an essential, trustworthy part of the 'bridge' between chaos and order.
